basics.name: Mechanical Engineering Tutor
basics.label: Mechanical Engineer with Tutoring Experience
basics.summary: Driven and a self-motivated Mechanical Engineer with experience teaching Mechanical Engineering courses to undergraduate students. Seeking opportunities to use those concepts in the field of Construction and Management.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Tutored Mechanics, Probability and Statistics, MATLAB, Operations Research, Calculus

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed coursework and took lectures for 120 undergraduate students. Subjects taught Heat and Mass Transfer, Strength of Materials.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked on design project of central chilled water plant system layout for a 45000sq.ft. Retail outlet. Studied the project life cycle management of the System. Headed the Intern team and presented weekly progress reports to the Lead Design Engineer

volunteer.summary: Helped students from the underprivileged sections of the society to understand basic concepts of Mathematics. Coach for their Cricket and Field Hockey teams
